function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Changes in building after construction requiring adaptability","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unbalanced utilization of management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tensions between different modes of existence of smart city technologies in pandemic management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of covtech for pandemic management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical context and legacy of unable to comply with lockdown rules","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Police intervention and use of force against homeless activism","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of private partnerships in building icccs may lead to security and privacy cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of enumeration in informal settlements to support rights claims in terms of service
